author: Patrick Saunders
title: Jose Iglesias won’t hit like Trevor Story, but Rockies like his defense at shortstop
description: There's no way that Jose Iglesias will replace Trevor Story's power at the plate or his athleticism in the field or on the bases, but Rockies manager Bud Black is confident that Iglesias will do a solid job at shortstop.
content:
A Rockies pitcher’s best friend is a groundball.
Last season, Colorado starters induced 85 groundball double plays, the most by any rotation in the majors. The starters’ 45.3 groundball percentage r… [+3987 chars]
source.name: The Denver Post
